topic.title: Reason Procedure Not Attempted Observation - conformance rules

lines.i: NEMSIS Trace: EProcedures.03 pertinent negatives, EArrest.03 negative values This is a superset of both value sets: the question is the same, even if the .90 values are appropriate only for CPR and the .95 for all other procedures.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.137"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67504-1" Reason Not Attempted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Reason Procedure not Performed Superset 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.100 STATIC
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67504-1" Reason Not Attempted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Reason Procedure not Performed Superset 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.100 STATIC

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.137"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="235519380"/> <code code="67504-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Reason Not Attempted"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="700734765"/> </observation>
